hero.title: Thoughtful software, made with care.
hero.subtitle: Web apps, websites, and the occasional weird experiment. Turning caffeine and curiosity into things people can actually use.

services.title: What I Do
services.header: Every project starts with a conversation. You bring the vision, I bring the craft, and together we build something that matters.
services.footer_cursor: Free snacks. But I'm working on it.

development.title: Custom Development
development.description: I'm your advocate, and I can solve the process problems plaguing your company. No matter how granular, or how involved.

communication.title: Ongoing Communication
communication.description: If you've been ghosted before, you'll appreciate weekly updates and responses within hours, not days. You'll always know where your project stands.

iteration.title: Fast Iteration
iteration.description: If you're watching competitors move faster, I help you ship improvements in days instead of months. Speed without sacrificing quality.

projects.title: Work
projects.header: Real projects, real results. Click any card to see the full story behind the build.
projects.footer: More in the works. The best is yet to come.
